contextId.information: "650 talents of silver." You may convert this to a modern measure. AT: "22,000 kilograms of silver" or twenty-two thousand kilograms of silver" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bweight]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
You may convert this to a modern measure. AT: "3,400 kilograms of gold" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bweight]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_numbers]])
